SEARCH
Package org.example.utility.api.email

Class SendEmail

java.lang.Object
org.example.utility.api.email.SendEmail
public class SendEmail extends Object
This class handles the functionality for sending emails related to the Course Recommender system. It includes methods for sending a 2FA code to users and sending recommended courses to counselors.

  • Method Details

    • send2FA

      public void send2FA(String receiverEmail, String username, String subject, String generatedCode)
      Sends a 2FA (Two Factor Authentication) code to a user. The email includes an HTML body with the course recommender's logo, a message, and the generated code. The method runs asynchronously using a SwingWorker.
      Parameters:
      receiverEmail - The recipient's email address.
      username - The username of the recipient.
      subject - The subject of the email.
      generatedCode - The 2FA code to be sent to the recipient.

    • sendCourses

      public void sendCourses(Counselor counselor, User user)
      Sends an email with a list of recommended courses for a user to their assigned counselor. The email contains an HTML table listing the grades and corresponding courses.
      Parameters:
      counselor - The counselor to whom the email will be sent.
      user - The user whose recommended courses are to be sent.
